metadata.title: Tuesday, 13th June, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a modern water treatment plant in Mkushi Township in Mkushi North Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the project will commence;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is;
(d) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the project is; and
(e) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a police post in Magoye Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
